tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE connected_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name STRING,
    device_type STRING,
    device_status STRING,
    owner_id UUID,
    access_level STRING
)

CREATE TABLE access_control (
  access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  access_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_device_id FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES connected_devices(id)
);

CREATE TABLE device_roles (
    device_id INT,
    role_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY(device_id) REFERENCES connected_devices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(role_id) REFERENCES roles(role_id),
    PRIMARY KEY(device_id, role_id)
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE device_access (
    access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    role_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES device_roles(role_id)
);
